Hero.SubTitle: Open Beta!
Hero.Description: Challenge yourself! Pick a category and guess the hidden image pixel by pixel.

Feedback.Title: Feedback
Feedback.Placeholder: Ideas or suggestions to improve our product

PatchNotes.Title: Patch Notes
PatchNotes.Description: Recent updates and changes to Pixel Guess
1: Included categories: League of Legends, Valorant
2: Updated UI for better mobile responsiveness
3: Supported languages: English, Turkish, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Russian, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, Vietnamese
4: Fixed an issue where short-named characters (e.g., "Vi") did not appear in the search filter.
